force something ↔ down.translation[0].de: to make yourself eat or drink something, although you do not want it
I forced down a piece of stale bread.
to make a plane land by threatening to attack it
The hijacked plane was forced down by military jets.
force something ↔ down.translation[1].de: to make something go down in price
The price could fall to £100, forced down by competition from Asian producers.
